requirement: SafeEntry has been implemented for dine-in customers.
Temperature screening is conducted for customers of outlets that are located outside of institutionâ€™s temperature screening zone.
Table and seating arrangement adheres to the one-metre spacing between tables or groups
sub_requirement: Where tables/seats are fixed, tables/seats should be marked out, ensuring at least one-metre spacing

requirement: Queue is demarcated to ensure at least one-metre spacing between customers such as entrances and cashier counters
Staff to ensure customers maintain safe distance of one-metre when queuing and seated.
Staff to ensure customers wear a mask at all times, unless eating or drinking.
Hand sanitizers are placed at high touch areas
sub_requirement: i.e. tray return, collection point, outlet entrance/exit

requirement: Outlet promotes use of cashless payment modes.
All staff to wear a mask at all times, unless eating or drinking.
Mask worn by staff is in the correct manner
sub_requirement: i.e. cover nose and mouth, no hanging of mask under the chin/neck

requirement: All staff to record their temperature daily.
Staff to maintain safe distance of one-metre (where possible) and not congregate, including at common areas, and during break/meal times.
Check with supervisor that all staff record SafeEntry check-in and check-out
sub_requirement: Note: Supervisor is accountable for adherence
